Package sailpoint.api

Class IdentityHistoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.service.BaseListService<sailpoint.service.BaseListServiceContext>
      • sailpoint.api.IdentityHistoryService
  • public class IdentityHistoryService
extends sailpoint.service.BaseListService<sailpoint.service.BaseListServiceContext>
    Service class used to query for identity history items.

      • getPendingDecision

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getPendingDecision​(java.lang.String identityId,
                                                                                 CertificationItem item)
                                                                          throws GeneralException
        Gets a map representation of a pending decision for the given cert item. This reflects a decision on an unsigned cert which will not have a corresponding IdentityRequestItem yet, so will not be included in getIdentityHistory results
        Parameters:
        identityId - Identity ID
        item - CertificationItem
        Returns:
        Null if there is no non-included pending decision, or map if there is
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • getItems

        public java.util.List<IdentityHistoryItem> getItems​(IdentityHistoryItem.Type type,
                                                    java.lang.String identityId,
                                                    EntitlementSnapshot entitlements,
                                                    Certification.EntitlementGranularity granularity)
                                             throws GeneralException
        Gets the history items that exist for the given identity, type and entitlements. If type is null, all history items are returned.
        Parameters:
        identityId - ID of the identity to search for.
        type - Type of history item to retrieve, or null for all types.
        entitlements - EntitlementSnapshot to search for
        Returns:
        List of IdentityHistoryItem matching the given parameters.
        Throws:
        GeneralException
